definitions.definition: a compartment for the pilot and sometimes also the crew in an aircraft or spacecraft.
examples: flight deck, helm, control room; driver's seat I was invited into the cockpit to meet the pilot

definitions.definition: a compartment for the driver in a racing car.
a sunken area in the after deck of a boat providing space for members of the crew.
a place where a battle or other conflict takes place.
examples: the cockpit of capitalist conflict in Europe

definitions.definition: a place where cockfights are held.
